eecs2030.pe2

Class PhoneCardWallet

  • java.lang.Object
    • eecs2030.pe2.PhoneCardWallet

  • public class PhoneCardWallet
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a wallet of phone cards. Such a wallet has a name and a composed set of phone cards.
    Author:
    EECS2030

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhoneCardWallet(java.lang.String name)
      Create a PhoneCardWallet with the given name and an empty set of phone cards.
      PhoneCardWallet(java.lang.String name, java.util.Set<PhoneCard> cardSet)
      Create a PhoneCardWallet with the given name and set of phone cards.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhoneCardWallet

        public PhoneCardWallet(java.lang.String name)
        Create a PhoneCardWallet with the given name and an empty set of phone cards.
        Parameters:
        name - The wallet's name.
        Precondition:
        name is not null

      • PhoneCardWallet

        public PhoneCardWallet(java.lang.String name,
                       java.util.Set<PhoneCard> cardSet)
        Create a PhoneCardWallet with the given name and set of phone cards. A shallow copy of the set of cards is stored in the wallet.
        Parameters:
        name - The wallet's name.
        cardSet - The set of phone cards to be included in the wallet.
        Precondition:
        name and cardSet are not null

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of this wallet.
        Returns:
        the name of this wallet.

      • getCardSet

        public java.util.Set<PhoneCard> getCardSet()
        Get the set of cards contained in this wallet. A shallow copy of the set of cards in the wallet is returned.
        Returns:
        the set of cards contained in this wallet.

      • addCard

        public void addCard(PhoneCard card)
        Add the given phone card to this wallet.
        Parameters:
        card - the phone card to be added.
        Precondition:
        card is not null

      • removeCard

        public void removeCard(PhoneCard card)
        Remove the given phone card from this wallet.
        Parameters:
        card - the phone card to be removed.
        Precondition:
        card is not null

      • filter

        public java.util.Set<PhoneCard> filter(CallZone zone,
                                       double cost)
        Obtain the set of cards contained in this wallet that could be used to make a call to the given zone with the given cost. The method returns the set of all cards in the wallet that allow a call to the given zone and have a balance greater or equal to cost.
        Parameters:
        zone - the zone of the call.
        cost - the cost of the call.
        Precondition:
        zone is not null
        Returns:
        the set of cards contained in this wallet that could be used to make such a call.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Create a string representation of the wallet. The string is "PhoneCardWallet named " followed by the wallet's name followed by " with cards " followed by the wallet's card set's string representation.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string representation of the wallet.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Creates a hash code for the object. The hash code is generated by considering the wallet's name and card set.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the object's hash code.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares the wallet with another object for equality. Two PhoneCardWallet instances are equal if and only if their names are equal and their sets of cards are equal.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to compare with for equality.
        Returns:
        true if the wallet and object are equal; false otherwise.
